thread.title_full: HORRIBLE STAY AT HAMPTON INN SOHO - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Talat I
title: HORRIBLE STAY AT HAMPTON INN SOHO
text: We stayed at this hotel twice and got burned twice. Obviously we will not stay again but take caution when booking here. We were lured by lower price. Major problem during this particular stay was the partying that was going on at the bar till 4am then moved to our floor (10th) till 5:30am. Doors slamming, shouting, screaming. Called the front desk but no luck. Also, do not get a double bed, at least for rooms ending with 3 or 4. Rooms in Europe would be consider a chateau compared to what we had to stay in.
